Question: Does your child smile spontaneously, especially at people?
Does your child make eye contact with others?
Does your child respond when called by name?
Does your child enjoy playing with other children?
Does your child follow simple instructions?
Does your child use gestures (like waving) to communicate?
Does your child show interest in new experiences?
Does your child display a range of emotions?
Does your child imitate others during play?
Does your child initiate social interaction?
